values: 构架；骨架；支架；架构；组织结构；边框；窗框；装饰框；（frames）眼镜架；眼镜框；身材；体格；身躯；体形；精神状态；（电影的）画面；画格；镜头；帧；（连环漫画中的）一幅漫画；（网页的）一个区域；（赛前固定台球位置的）三角架；一局；一轮；一回合；一格；（Frame）弗雷姆（人名）
装框；装裱；给…装框子；给…镶边；表达；讲出；说出；陷害；诬告；诬陷；制定；制订；构想出；围住；围绕

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 制定；建造；给…加外框（frame的过去分词）
制定；构造；装框子（frame的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 参照标准；参考依据；标准；参考标架；参考坐标系
符合（或不符合）条件的；成为（没有成为）关注的焦点；被警方怀疑但未被通缉的
符合（或不符合）条件的；成为（没有成为）关注的焦点；被警方怀疑或通缉的

bilingual.source: Tighten the bolts to secure the frame.
The window frame needs to be repaired.
bilingual.target: 这个窗户的框架需要修理。

bilingual.source: He fixed the bent frame of his glasses.
bilingual.target: 他修好了眼镜弯曲的框架。

bilingual.source: The frame was welded to ensure stability.
bilingual.target: 框架被焊接以确保稳定性。

bilingual.source: The carpenter used a wedge to secure the frame.
He used rods to build the frame of the tent.
bilingual.target: 他用杆搭建了帐篷的框架。

bilingual.source: The welder repaired the broken metal frame.
bilingual.target: 焊工修理了破损的金属框架。

bilingual.source: The rect fits perfectly within the frame.
bilingual.target: 这个矩形完美地适合在框架内。

bilingual.source: The metal frame is warping under the pressure.
bilingual.target: 金属框架在压力下正在变形。

list.abstract: 在Java中，frame是一种控件，可作为父窗体加载其他swing控件，有子类JFrame类，父类Window类。
frame，电视剧《爱来了别错过》中的角色，由欧帕瓦·吉沙晚迪饰演。

yingyinNormal.en: In the past, they were built like this. The hull was constructed first in one big frame, and everything else was built into the hull as it went up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 过去他们像这样做船体，首先在一个大框架中建成做成后他的部件再一件件的添上去。

yingyinNormal.en: She didn't jump. Here it is, frame by frame.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她不是跳下去的。这里，我逐帧播放给你看。

yingyinNormal.en: Using nothing but a still frame camera, from 1996.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只能通过一个静止画面摄像头，还是1996年产的。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought we could put it in a really nice frame.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以选个漂亮的框子裱起来。

yingyinNormal.en: Anything yet? We have a signal, but there's no frame lock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有什么了吗？我们有信号，却不能锁定坐标。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, everyone. George, do you want to play on the climbing frame? The climbing frame is quite high. George does not like being up high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常感谢大家。乔治，你想不想玩攀登架啊？攀登架非常高。乔治不想爬那么高。

yingyinNormal.en: I framed Lionheart, I can frame you too. It's my word against yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我陷害了狮心，我也可以陷害你，你们空口无凭。

yingyinNormal.en: He bought a gun under Morris's name? Mr. Reese, it's another frame job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他以莫里斯的名义买枪？里瑟先生，这又是一次陷害。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it's not that sweet. I paid for the frame with your money and then got a massage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我其实没那么好，我用你的钱买了相框，还做了个按摩。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, this is a picture of the frame guy posing in front of a bright blue screen with a collie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一张相框模特儿，跟一只牧羊犬站在浅蓝背景前的照片。

yingyinNormal.en: The same imitation gold leaf from the Chagall frame? That is correct. And there was nothing else.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟夏加尔画框上的人造金箔是一样的吗？是的，而且除了金箔外没有别的东西了。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa! You know George is a bit scared of heights! Sorry, George! Let's play on the climbing frame!
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪，你应该知道乔治他怕高。对不起哦，乔治。我们一起玩攀登架吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I never thought of it like that. Boy, frame of reference will just sneak up on you, won't it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从未这样想过，天啊，看来你很喜欢跟人抬杠啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Nah, Phoebs, that's the guy that comes in the frame. No it isn't, this is my dad, alright, I'll show you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比，那是相框附送的相片。不，这是我爸爸，好，我拿给你们看。

yingyinNormal.en: I have devised an experiment that I believe will increase your feelings for me in an accelerated time frame.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我设计了一个实验，我相信这能让你加快对我产生感情。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, this is a picture frame from Ben to my parents. Cute. I got some, hers and hers towels for Susan and Carol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你们看，这是班送给我父母的相框，很可爱。“她的”跟“她的”毛巾，给苏珊跟卡萝。

yingyinNormal.en: Candy Cat and Pedro Pony are on the climbing frame. Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog, and Rebecca Rabbit are playing on the slide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小猫凯迪和小马佩德罗在玩攀登架。小羊苏西，小狗丹尼，和小兔瑞贝卡在玩滑滑梯。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. I'll talk to the prosecutor and see what I can get, but you have to get yourself into this new frame of mind, ma'am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我会和公诉人谈谈，看看能有什么结果，但你必须建立起一个观念，女士。

yingyinNormal.en: You know when I locked myself in the bathroom at my wedding, it was because I was trying to pop the window out of the frame.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我结婚时也躲在厕所不出来，不过那是因为我要撬开窗户。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. What artificial satellite has seen glimpses of Einstein's predicted frame dragging? And of course, it's gravity probe B.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，哪颗人造卫星记录下了爱因斯坦预言的时空结构拖曳现象？答案是引力探测器B卫星。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (加)架构; 边框; 骨骼; 身躯

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 构架；框架；基本框架
v. 给（图片；照片）换框；重新装裱；全新地拟定

word_family.mean: n. 基本框架；画框；门框；窗框；边框；框架；替换框架；画面；画格；三角框；（Frame）人名：弗雷姆

sense_info_list.en: a rigid structure that surrounds or encloses something
sense_info_list.zh: (加)架构; 边框; 骨骼; 身躯

examination_example.sentence: Conversely, someone with a small <highlight>frame</highlight> may have high body fat but a normal BMI.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，身材矮小的人可能体脂高，但身体质量指数正常。

examination_example.sentence: The dearth of moral purpose <highlight>frames</highlight> not only the fact of such widespread phone hacking but the terms on which the trial took place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 道德目的的缺失不仅体现在普遍电话窃听的事实同时体现在审判发生所依据的法律条款上。

word_usage.usage: frame作动词时，为及物动词，其后可直接接名词或代词，如：frame the picture 把照片放到相框里。
frame作名词，表示“眼镜框”时，常用复数形式，如：gold-rimmed frames 金边镜框。

examination_example.sentence: If the wooden <highlight>frame</highlight> of the towers had caught fire, it could have sent the bells crashing down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果双子塔的木结构起火，可能会使大钟轰然倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: Most consist of timber <highlight>frames</highlight> that rest on stone blocks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大部分由木架构成，坐落在石块上。

sense_info_list.en: a basic structure that underlies or supports a system, concept, or text

examination_example.sentence: Another way to improve your <highlight>frame</highlight> of mind is to mix things up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个改善你的心态的方法是把事情搞混。

examination_example.sentence: Internal recovery refers to the shorter periods of relaxation that take place within the <highlight>frames</highlight> of the work day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 内部恢复指的是在工作日的范围内进行的较短时间的放松。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个专注于公共框架问题的研究小组，在英国维持着对贫困的刻板印象和叙述。

examination_example.sentence: A fixed <highlight>frame</highlight> will make time meaningless.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 固定的框架会使时间变得毫无意义。

examination_example.sentence: Modern technology may help to shape the rivers' temporal <highlight>frame</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现代技术可能有助于塑造河流的时间框架。

examination_example.sentence: It's a sort of observatory that reveals how the rivers are behaving from their own temporal <highlight>frame</highlight> (时间框架).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种从时间框架揭示河流行为的观察站。

examination_example.sentence: So he made a 12-inch cube with a green metal <highlight>frame</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 于是他制作了一个12英寸的立方体，有一个绿色的金属框架。
